data.Content: AI is getting more powerful! But why AI is not a panacea for data workers? Check our interview on human-AI collaborative data storytelling here!
Our paper Notable: On-the-fly Assistant for Data Storytelling in Computational Notebooks is accepted to CHI 2023. See you in Hamburg!
Our paper about explainable dashboard design mining and recommendation is accepted to TVCG! Check the pre-print here.
I start my visiting at UC Berkeley with Prof. Aditya Parameswaran.
I receive Microsoft Research Asia Fellowship (i.e., Microsoft Research PhD Fellowship in Asia-Pacific area)! The announcement is available in English and Chinese.
Our two proposals on analyzing visualizations and online education are funded with HKD 1M (by HK RGC) and HKD 900K (by HK ITC)!
I will be an on-site student volunteer in VIS 2022! Look forward to joining the conference!
Our poster on visual analytics for pre-screening students with learning disabilities has been accepted to ASSETS 2022!
I will take an intern in Microsoft Research Asia under the supervision of Dr. Yun Wang.
I receive HKUST RedBird Academic Excellence Award for research postgraduate students!
Our paper Structure-aware Visualization Retrieval receives CHI 2022 Honorable Mention Award!
I will serve as a program committee member of CIKM 2022.
A Work-in-Progress (short paper) on visual analytics for K-12 programming is accepted to ACM L@S 2022!
Two full papers and one late-breaking work are accepted to CHI 2022 and one poster will appear in VR 2022!
I pass my qualifying exam and become a PhD Candidate!
Our paper on knowledge graph-based visualization recommendation is accepted to VIS 2021! The preprint version is here.
I will serve as a program committee member of CIKM2021.
I will attend and present our paper on online proctoring at CHI2021. Video preview can be found here.
I start my visiting at Singapore Management University under the supervision of Prof. Yong Wang.
Our paper Deep Colormap Extraction from Visualizations is accepted to TVCG! The preprint version is available here.
Our paper on online proctoring is officially accepted to CHI2021! The preprint version is available here.
